attributes.additional_details: The British Public, in the past have been told we would have a referendum on our membership of the EEC; we joined the common market, not the EEC. Now is the time to hold a referendum. Should the citizens decided that we withdraw, all financial savings made are, at the same time, committed to reduce the Countries DEBT and not used on alternative schemes until such times we have a trading surplus.Bring back GREAT BRITAIN.
